description:
Tppd! allows you to use the Untappd service which allows to see which beers your friends are drinking and lets you check-in and show your friends which beer you're drinking.

As you explore more brews and locations, you will uncover a variety of badges. Compete with your friends to see who can earn more!

This is the first version. The following features should work without a problem:

- Search&Checkin
- Friends timeline
- Public timeline
- Venue support for checkins
- Foursquare&Gowalla venue support (checkin to 4sq or Gowalla right from within a beer checkin)
- comment& toast on checkins
- JustType integration for beer search
